sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SE DETENDENDO, in law, a plea uſed for him that is charged with the death of another, by alleging that he was under a neceſſity of doing what he did in his own defence: as that the other aſſaulted him in such a manner, that if he had not done what he did, he must have been in hazard of his own life. See Homicide and Murder.
